message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL 

The paper discusses document classification, which is a subfield of information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also mentions text processing and term weighting, which are common topics in natural language processing (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG). The proposed method is based on semantic relations between words, which is a topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and deep learning (cs.DL). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IR, followed by cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.DL.
